lines.text: i , j , k , even , odd , n , x and y are ints with even and odd = 0 , j = 1 and k = 2 ; a is an array of ints with size 56
lines.code: int i , j = 1 , k = 2 , even = 0 , odd = 0 , n , x , y , a [ 56 ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n / 2 exclusive , read input to a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < n / 2 ; i ++ ) { cin >> a [ i ] ; }

lines.text: sort a from index 0 to n / 2
assign j - a [ i ] to x
if x is less than 0 , invert the sign of x
assign k - a [ i ] to y
if y is less than 0 , invert the sign of y
if odd is greater than even
